articles.title: Reliance Industries and Tata Group may reportedly enter into first-ever partnership with this deal - Times of India
articles.description: Reliance Industries, owned by billionaire Mukesh Ambani, is reportedly negotiating to acquire Disney’s share in Tata Play, a satellite TV service provider, according to the Business Standard.

articles.title: ‘Tech sector at $254bn in year of uncertainty’ | Mint - Mint
articles.description: India’s technology and tech services industry is expected to end FY24 with $253.9 billion net revenues, up by 3.8% from a year earlier in a difficult year for bellwether IT services companies
